projects.name: get-dem
projects.short: For any point selected on the US map, retrieves corresponding 1 arc-second DEMs from USGS via HTTP request.

projects.name: lidar-nn
projects.short: Won't you be, my neighbor? Based on user-defined parameters, regularizes pointcloud data via nearest neighbor interpolation.

projects.name: when-rad
projects.short: Calculates if/when each point on a DEM is exposed to direct solar radiation. Example of Numba-accelerated functional Python.

projects.name: nginx-wrapper
projects.short: It's the site you're on right now! Flask app served with Gunicorn and containerized behind an Nginx reverse proxy with SSL.

projects.name: ufunc-correct
projects.short: NumPy's universal functions (ufuncs) make array operations fast. This app uses ufuncs to calculate solar irradiation intensity based on sun position and slope/aspect of a DEM.

projects.name: apps.cstern.io
projects.short: Serves multiple Panel apps from a containerized BokehTornado service. The fiddliest part was getting bidirectional websocket communication through the SSL-secured Nginx proxy.

projects.name: albedo
projects.short: The project that kickstarted my scientific Python journey in earnest. Here's an overview of what I've accomplished thus far in computational methods for snow radiative transfer modeling.

projects.name: jinja-resume
projects.short: Over-automation can be a fool's errand, if it takes longer than doing the task manually and/or doesn't pay dividends. But I think using Jinja to layout my resume actually paid off.

projects.name: math+hilite
projects.short: To make my project descriptions more informative, I wanted to be able to render mathematical notation and syntax-highlighted code on this side. Here's a summary of how I achieved that.
